Class ApplicationView

java.lang.Object
view.abstracts.ARenderView
view.ApplicationView
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewInterface
public class ApplicationView extends ARenderView implements ViewInterface
View for application-related operations in the BTO Management System.

    • ApplicationView

      public ApplicationView(User currentUser, ApplicationController applicationController, ProjectController projectController, BookingController bookingController)
      Constructs an ApplicationView with the specified controllers and current user.
      Parameters:
      currentUser - the user currently logged in
      applicationController - the controller responsible for application logic
      projectController - the controller responsible for project management
      bookingController - the controller responsible for booking management

    • displayGenerateReceipt

      public void displayGenerateReceipt()
      Displays and manages withdrawal requests for projects managed by the current HDB Manager. Only accessible to users with HDBManager role. Prompts the manager to select a project, lists withdrawal requests, and allows management of a selected request.

    • displayManageWithdrawals

      public void displayManageWithdrawals()
      Displays the interface for managing withdrawal requests.
